constructor-arg.value: SELECT * FROM v_movies ORDER BY random() limit ?;

INSERT INTO movie ( name_russian, name_native, year_of_release, description, rating, price, picture_path ) VALUES ( :nameRussian, :nameNative, :yearOfRelease, :description, :rating, :price, :picturePath );

INSERT INTO movie ( id, name_russian, name_native, year_of_release, description, rating, price, picture_path ) VALUES ( :id, :nameRussian, :nameNative, :yearOfRelease, :description, :rating, :price, :picturePath ) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT movie_pkey DO UPDATE SET name_russian = EXCLUDED.name_russian, name_native = EXCLUDED.name_native, year_of_release = EXCLUDED.year_of_release, description = EXCLUDED.description, rating = EXCLUDED.rating, price = EXCLUDED.price, picture_path = EXCLUDED.picture_path ;
SELECT g.* FROM movie_genre mg INNER JOIN genre g ON mg.genre_id = g.id WHERE movie_id = ?;
SELECT r.* FROM review r INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.movie_id = ?;
SELECT u.* FROM users u WHERE (u.email = ?) AND (u.pswhash = crypt(?, pswhash));
SELECT c.* FROM movie_country mc INNER JOIN country c ON mc.country_id = c.id WHERE movie_id = ?;
